meanings.definition: A mischievous or troublesome person, especially a child.
meanings.sent1: The little hellion kept pulling pranks on his siblings.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood kids knew him as the local hellion.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous hellion thought it would be funny to hide all the cookies.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was chaos with the little hellion running around like a tornado.
meanings.sent5: The mischievous child was a true hellion, always causing trouble wherever he went.

meanings.sent1: The rowdy hellion at the party was dancing on tables.
meanings.sent2: The unruly group of teenagers were known as the local hellions.
meanings.sent3: The rowdy hellion accidentally knocked over the punch bowl.
meanings.sent4: The unruly crowd at the concert turned into a sea of hellions.
meanings.sent5: The rowdy individual was a true hellion, always causing a commotion wherever he went.
